unnormalised: Hey! Return policies are super important, right? Especially with online shopping these days. I remember buying a saree for Diwali from a website and it wasn't what I expected. Luckily, their return policy was hassle-free. Makes you trust the vendor, doesn't it? Like having a plate of hot biryani – satisfying! Good return policies build trust!
